name: meltyfi-sui
description: MeltyFi Protocol - Making the illiquid liquid on Sui blockchain

scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules frontend/node_modules && rm -f package-lock.json frontend/package-lock.json
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install
scripts.fix:move-config: cd contracts/meltyfi && find sources -name '*.move' -exec sed -i '' -e 's/use sui::transfer;//g' -e 's/use sui::tx_context::{Self, TxContext};//g' -e 's/use sui::object::{Self, UID, ID};//g' {} +
scripts.check:env: echo 'Checking environment configuration...' && grep -E 'NEXT_PUBLIC_SUI_NETWORK|NEXT_PUBLIC_SUI_RPC_URL' .env || echo 'No .env file found'
scripts.switch:testnet: sui client switch --env testnet && echo 'Switched to testnet environment'

author: MeltyFi Team
